data.title: Very popular
data.text: Tex-mex fare. Large portions, casual atmosphere. The breakfast tacos are HUGE and reasonable. They have a bar and this place is very popular.

data.title: Experience real Mexican Flavor
data.text: Tradional mexican food with a homelike environment. Try the Carne Guisada for a delicious authentic mexican plate. M&M Pinto Beans offers that real Mexican flavor that quite often you do not find in the TEX-MEX restaurants.

data.title: great food at a reasonable price
data.text: GREAT, WELL COOKED MAND PREPARED FOOD.   We eat here a lot.  Very good service.  Good atmosphere.   Very clean bathrooms/  I highly recommend it.

data.title: Favorite Breakfast spot (if you are not in a hurry)
data.text: Love, love this place. I now there may be long lines in the am but it is soooo worth it. Now if I am late then I will not stop. But even if I'm in a little hurry they can keep the line moving pretty well. The food is awesome & reasonably priced. I can share a taco with my husband, that's how big the potions are.

data.title: Great fajitas! Yum!
data.text: The fajitas poblano are just the very best! So tender & full of flavor too!  One of our definite favorites!  The service is typically very good unless they are busy, busy -& even then they try really hard to do a good job.

data.title: Great food, quick and love the drive through
data.text: Drive through nice option, food always good!  Easy phone in and pick up.  Same good quality as other location.

data.title: An Excellent Mexican Food Place. South Texas at Its Best!
data.text: I shouldn't be giving away my secret go to place for Mexican food but if you are a TripAdvisor its a must have to thing. I think I've pretty much tried everything on the menu and it has all been super fantastic. Their margaritas are to die for and salsa and chips is a must. (free is good!) Fajitas are equally great esp. with onions and peppers. They also have seafood dishes, mainly grilled and all is good. Enjoy! (and drink a on the rocks marg for me!)

data.title: Not too bad...
data.text: The food is presented real pretty and bright, but it is so very greasy. I would say that the flavor was good and the amount of food you receive for the pricing is a pretty generous amount.

data.title: Great breakfast
data.text: Huge breakfast burritos. Great salsa to finish it all off. Your going to have a hard time finding a better breakfast for the price and the amount of food

data.title: The best Tex-Mex in town!
data.text:
Great service, delicious food, and the portions are HUGE!

Great atmosphere, especially in the back barroom, where once a month, they host Victoria's only spoken word/poetry open mic...

Never disappointed and the complimentary Queso with chips is a great little bonus!

data.title: Decent Mexican Food
data.text: Not my favorite but good... Floors were pretty dirty, tables clean. Chips need to be hot.  Probably won't go back,  Although there are always lots of vehicles in the parking lot .

data.title: Will not eat there
data.text: Our local newspaper publishes the health report done for our county. This place has yet to get a passable health report.

data.title: ALWAYS PACKED THAT SAYS IT ALL!!
data.text: you have to eat here. the plates are huge filled with food you definately get your moneys worth! and their barbacoa tacos are killer! there is some great mexican food here!

data.title: Excelente sazón y atención ,,
data.text:
Muy ricos almuerzos y bien servido,,y las chicas hablan en espańol, en nuestro viaje de ida y regreso ahí almorzamos,,,,riquisisisisismooo en mi viaje hacia Orlando de Tampico, llegamos a descansar en el hotel de a lado Executive inn, NO LO RECOMIENDO pésimo servicio y puro cuento que con whif,,,en el bańo se encharca el agua de la regadera, huele mal,,,y carísimo, llegamos a otro en Misisipí,,muy bonito y limpio con almuerzo incluido y súper económico,,,
BUENO EL RESTAURANT SI VALLAN
